column4: i add a repo to sources.list file. after that i write on terminal sudo aptitude update. but now the remastersys package is not on the synaptic . what sould i do now ?
its probably not in the repo you added? did aptitude spit out any errors?
it is on the repo. i add it manually. it has to work on ubuntu 10.04 because it is the repo link for lucid. it writes on official site.
